text: The Benson Archeological Site, designated 13WD50 in the state archaeological inventory, is a historic site located near Smithland, Iowa, United States. Pottery fragments found at the site include Black Sand and Crawford ware from the early Woodland period and Valley ware from the Middle Woodland period. The site was listed on the National Register of Historic Places in 1984. ==References== Category:Woodland period Category:Native American history of Iowa Category:Protected areas of Woodbury County, Iowa Category:National Register of Historic Places in Woodbury County, Iowa Category:Archaeological sites on the National Register of Historic Places in Iowa
title: Benson Archeological Site (13WD50)
